name: 8 Hour Jam Infinite Running Game
description:
This was a game made in about 8 hours for a competition to win a pair of tickets to train jam. It was done with one programmer (Myself) and one artist (Lukas Bartee). It was designed as an infinite runner where you play as a thief that has stolen the queen's crown and you are running from the queen's train. You have to jump over obstacles to avoid death and gain points.

A few quick notes about some problems

The physics are fairly broken so if the player flies off the screen or something else weird happens you may have to force restart the exe

Pressing the restart button may seem like it didn't work at first, Give it a second or two and the game will reset

The restart/ death screen text is incredibly small in the build so here's what it says "You done goofed it, press r to restart"

Controls:

Press Space or Left Mouse Click To jump over the obstacles, Press r to restart if you have died
